snippet.title: The Edge of Allegoria - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
This ain't no f@#%ing kid's game! The Edge of Allegoria is a charming new indie game brimming with monsters, magic and adventure. With a pinch of dark humor, moderate pixel violence and lots and lots of self-irony, the turn-based 2D RPG will soon capture the hearts of all pixel fans. The Edge of Allegoria will be released for PC on Steam at the end of 2024.

PLAY THE DEMO & WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870700/The_Edge_of_Allegoria/

Follow CobraTekku Games on social media:
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CobraTekkuGames
➤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cobratekku_games/
➤ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cobratekku.games
➤ X: https://twitter.com/CobraTekkuGames

➤ Website: https://www.cobratekku.games

#TheEdgeOfAllegoria #CobraTekkuGames
